attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Initial expand state for items in list

attributes.name: compact
attributes.description: If table should be more compact, with less padding and smaller icons.

attributes.name: saveExpanded
attributes.description: Use save button to save expanded items.

attributes.name: selectFromScope
attributes.description: An address for where the user should be able to select entities from, when adding to the list

attributes.name: hideInvalidTypes
attributes.description: When appending to the list, whether or not the user should see invalid types in the entity selector

attributes.name: headers
attributes.description: Name of primitive child attributes to display in item

attributes.name: expandViewConfig
attributes.description: Which ViewConfig to render when expanding the list item.

attributes.name: openViewConfig
attributes.description: Which ViewConfig to render when open the list item.

attributes.name: templates
attributes.description: Attribute on parent (of same type as list) which should be used as template when instantiating new items. (e.g. 'template' will use the 'template' attribute on the parent.)
